name: Steal The Spotlight
description: Steal the Spotlight is a 4-player, 2v2 team-based action platform fighting game. Play as the Forget-Me-Nots or the Rose Sisters in this race to reach stardom. The girls must charge the ball in a moving spotlight and fight to bring it back to their team curtain stages, where the charged ball will transfer its light to the stage lights. Attack rival players with a microphone stand and steal the ball using a microphone cord. The first team to light up their curtain stages first wins the performance of a lifetime!
